StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNumberOfInterviewsForRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @NewRSS bit, @Interviews integer OUTPUT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TotalInterviews DECIMAL DECLARE @AVG DECIMAL (4,1) DECLARE @NumRSSs INT
--- if the RSS has been open at least 3 months (@NewRSS = 0) then get its number of contracts IF @NewRSS = 0 BEGIN
SET @Interviews = (SELECT SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS + RA.OT_INTERVIEWS + RA.AC_INTERVIEWS + RA.HV_INTERVIEWS + ISNULL(RA.DC_INTERVIEWS,0) ) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate)) END ELSE BEGIN /* IF THIS RSS HAS BEEN OPEN LESS THAN 3 MONTHS THEN GET THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF CONTRACTS FOR ALL THE RSSs UNDER THE PARENT RS */ SET @TotalInterviews = (SELECT SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS + RA.OT_INTERVIEWS + RA.AC_INTERVIEWS + RA.HV_INTERVIEWS + ISNULL(RA.DC_INTERVIEWS,0) ) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @NumRSSs = (SELECT COUNT(RO.ORGANIZATION_ID) FROM [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y')
IF @NumRSSs > 0 BEGIN SET @AVG = @TotalInterviews/@NumRSSs END ELSE BEGIN SET @AVG = 0 END
--- ROUND THE AVERAGE UP AND RETURN THE NUMBER OF INTERVIEWS SET @Interviews = CEILING(@AVG)
END
